name: @feedzai/eslint-config-feedzai
description: Feedzai's base JS ESLint extensible configuration

scripts.deploy:publish: npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags
scripts.deploy:major: npm run deploy:tasks && npm version major && npm run deploy:publish
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run deploy:tasks && npm version minor && npm run deploy:publish
scripts.deploy:patch: npm run deploy:tasks && npm version patch && npm run deploy:publish

author: Victor Fernandes <victor.fernandes@feedzai.com>
